intent_atoms.description: Create a BoxToggleView wrapper component that wraps native SwiftUI Toggle and supports custom accessibility labels, disabled state, and future DS.Toggle integration.

Create a BoxTextInputView wrapper component that wraps native SwiftUI TextField with built‑in validation error display, platform‑adaptive keyboard types, copyable text support, and future DS.TextInput integration.

Create a BoxPickerView wrapper component that wraps native SwiftUI Picker with generic type support, platform‑adaptive styles (segmented vs. menu), accessibility labels including selected option, and future DS.Picker integration.
All three components must be implemented in separate files under 300 lines each following One File = One Entity principle.
Unit tests covering all code paths with ≥90% coverage must exist for each component.
Snapshot test placeholders for light/dark modes and all component states must be present, pending snapshot library integration.
Accessibility tests achieving ≥98% WCAG 2.1 AA compliance score must be written.
Components must expose no magic numbers in public APIs and use design token placeholders for future styling.
All incomplete FoundationUI integration work is marked with @todo #220 comments.
Concurrency annotations: all view creation and test code must be annotated with @MainActor.
The system shall never use force unwraps; all optionals are safely handled.
SwiftLint violations must be zero once the build environment is available.
Use native SwiftUI components as placeholders until DS components are integrated, allowing functional prototypes and test coverage.
Adopt PDD (Puzzle‑Driven Development) to track incomplete work via @todo #220 markers.
Apply design tokens (DS.Spacing, DS.Radius, DS.Color… ) for future consistency across components.

functional_units.name: BoxToggleView
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI wrapper component that exposes a toggle control with custom accessibility labels, disabled state support, and placeholder for DS.Toggle integration.

functional_units.name: BoxTextInputView
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI wrapper component that exposes a text input field with built‑in validation error display, platform‑adaptive keyboard types, copyable text support, and accessibility announcements for errors.

functional_units.name: BoxPickerView
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI wrapper component that exposes a picker control supporting generic types (enum, string, integer), platform‑adaptive styles (segmented vs. menu), and accessibility labels including the selected option.

functional_units.description: A comprehensive unit test suite for the form control components covering initialization, property handling, accessibility, disabled state, validation, keyboard type, generic type support, style overrides, and component composition.
